lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.environment

Interface IcrashEnvironment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IcrashEnvironmentImpl

    public interface IcrashEnvironment
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The Interface IcrashEnvironment, which makes the methods public for the RMI access.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doTest()
      Do test runs a test to confirm the environment is up and working.
      ActActivator getActActivator()
      Gets the actor activator set for the system.
      ActAdministrator getActAdministrator(java.lang.String keyName)
      Gets the act administrator from the hashtable using the key provided.
      ActAuthenticated getActAuthenticated(java.lang.String keyName)
      Gets the authenticated actor from the system with the name specified.
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,ActComCompany> getActComCompanies()
      Gets the entire hashtable of actor communication companies in the system.
      ActCoordinator getActCoordinator(java.lang.String keyName)
      Gets the actor coordinator from the hashtable using the key value provided.
      ActMsrCreator getActMsrCreator()
      Gets the actor MSR creator from the system, this is created at moment of initiation.
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,ActAdministrator> getAdministrators()
      Gets all of the administrators that have been stored in the hashtable.
      ActComCompany getComCompany(java.lang.String keyName)
      Gets a communication company from the hashtable using the key value provided.
      void setActActivator(ActActivator aActActivator)
      Sets the actor activator for the system, there can only be one in the entire system.
      void setActAdministrator(java.lang.String keyName, ActAdministrator aActAdministrator)
      Puts an actor administrator into a hashtable containing all current system admins.
      void setActCoordinator(java.lang.String keyName, ActCoordinator aActCoordinator)
      Puts an actor coordinator into the hashtable of the system.
      void setComCompany(java.lang.String keyName, ActComCompany aActComCompany)
      Puts a communication company into the hashtable containing all communication companies in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • doTest

        void doTest()
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Do test runs a test to confirm the environment is up and working. It doesn't do much, but I've left it in
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • setActAdministrator

        void setActAdministrator(java.lang.String keyName,
                         ActAdministrator aActAdministrator)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Puts an actor administrator into a hashtable containing all current system admins.
        Parameters:
        keyName - The key of which to store the actor by, keeps this the same as that you use the get actor method. Currently we use the login name as the key
        aActAdministrator - The actor administrator to place in the hashtable
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • getActAdministrator

        ActAdministrator getActAdministrator(java.lang.String keyName)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the act administrator from the hashtable using the key provided.
        Parameters:
        keyName - The key name to use when retrieving from the hashtable
        Returns:
        The actor retrieved from the database, can be null if one does not exist within the hashtable with the correct key
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • getAdministrators

        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,ActAdministrator> getAdministrators()
                                                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets all of the administrators that have been stored in the hashtable.
        Returns:
        The hashtable of all the administrators in the hashtable
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • setActActivator

        void setActActivator(ActActivator aActActivator)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the actor activator for the system, there can only be one in the entire system.
        Parameters:
        aActActivator - the new actor activator for the system
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • getActActivator

        ActActivator getActActivator()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the actor activator set for the system.
        Returns:
        the actor activator set in the system
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • setComCompany

        void setComCompany(java.lang.String keyName,
                   ActComCompany aActComCompany)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Puts a communication company into the hashtable containing all communication companies in the system.
        Parameters:
        keyName - The key of which to store the actor by, keeps this the same as that you use the get actor method. Currently we use the name of the company as the key
        aActComCompany - the actor communication company to store
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • getComCompany

        ActComCompany getComCompany(java.lang.String keyName)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets a communication company from the hashtable using the key value provided.
        Parameters:
        keyName - The name of the communication company to retrieve
        Returns:
        The communication company found, could be null if none is found
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • setActCoordinator

        void setActCoordinator(java.lang.String keyName,
                       ActCoordinator aActCoordinator)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Puts an actor coordinator into the hashtable of the system.
        Parameters:
        keyName - The key of which to store the actor by, keeps this the same as that you use the get actor method. Currently we use the login name as the key
        aActCoordinator - The actor coordinator stored in the hashtable
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • getActCoordinator

        ActCoordinator getActCoordinator(java.lang.String keyName)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the actor coordinator from the hashtable using the key value provided.
        Parameters:
        keyName - The login name of the coordinator to retrieve
        Returns:
        The actor retrieved from the database, can be null if one does not exist within the hashtable with the correct key
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

        Returns:
        The hashtable of communication companies

      • getActAuthenticated

        ActAuthenticated getActAuthenticated(java.lang.String keyName)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the authenticated actor from the system with the name specified.
        Parameters:
        keyName - Name of the actor to retrieve
        Returns:
        An authenticated actor, if found, otherwise a null
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception
